title: Ecko the Gecko: Learns What it Means to be a Gecko
description: In this book, Ecko, the curious little gecko learns about gratitude, empathy, compassion, kindness, and optimism. The story presents simplified explanations that most ages will easily understand, while the activity pages are a bit more advanced for younger learners to complete alone to encourage open dialogue and calls to action that fortify comprehension.
author: HeavenLee Molina-Neal
